text:
BookXchange | Full-stack Engineer | Miami/Ft. Lauderdale, Florida area | ONSITE, FULL-TIME

We are a growing wholesale/distributor of books and textbooks. We are looking for a full-stack engineer with the desire to do a mixture of software development and product management. The role reports directly to senior management. Competitive salary + bonus eligibility. Looking for:

- Full stack experience

- Experience with at least one web framework (We use Django and Flask, but looking for experience in web development generally, not necessarily these specific experience)

- Knowledge of AWS or other cloud deployment platforms

Get in touch at tech@bookxchange.com
